local_intent: Perceive red_plate, move above it, align, lower until contact, verify contact, place white plate centered, release gripper, retreat
assumptions: red_plate is within sensor view and detectable (retries allowed)
allowed binned values (e.g., 0.05, 1200, 10) suffice for safe execution
gripper state was opened earlier as per global tree
coherence_with_global: Implements the red_plate transfer segment consistent with the global tree: perception (retry), move-above, lower-to-contact, place, release, and retreat.
